column4: g'day guys & gals. Newbie here. I got a panasonic camera which has software that apparently can only be installed in windows or mac systems.  If i read it right, I need to install WINE so that it can install properly - right?
software to do what exactly? Most Digital camers can work as a usb storage drive/device and dont really need extra software
if the software has some features you like . you could try installing it with wine.
